subject: Standing In Queue
text:
How deep was 
the lake at sunset― 
where my life trailed 
from beach to beach? 

My animal inside 
was dead. 
Do you believe in 
reincarnation? 
I will embrace the non-violent 
palm.

It was the carnage 
of moment. The brutality of 
its strength casts spell.

There was a quick 
about-face. Dark night 
will paint your face 
with stars.

Becoming a drunk 
survivor of your grace 
I am blunting 
my pain.
